Symbol.Script_3D:
! Horiz Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- HORIZONTAL PRESSURE OPERATED CONDENSATE PUMP --- !
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed GROUP "Connections1" RESOL 10
ADD ConPosX_1,0,ConPosZ_1 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_1/2, 2, 2*pipeL1,ConWidth_1/2, 2 DEL 1
ADD ConPosX_2,0,ConPosZ_2 MULx -1 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_2/2, 2, 2*pipeL2,ConWidth_2/2, 2 DEL 2 ENDGROUP
RESOL res
ADD -A/2+pipeL1,0,ZZYZX/2 ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, tankR,360,4013 DEL 2
ADDx -A/2+0.4*tankR+0.15*tankL ROTy -90 PRISM 4,0.08*tankL, 0,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2, 0.8*tankR, 0, 0.8*tankR DEL 2
ADDx A/2-0.4*tankR-(0.15-0.08)*tankL ROTy -90 PRISM 4,0.08*tankL, 0,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2, 0.8*tankR, 0, 0.8*tankR DEL 2
CUTEND
GROUP "tank1" RESOL res ADD -A/2,0,ZZYZX/2 ROTy 90
ADDz 0.4*tankR CYLIND tankL-0.8*tankR,tankR MULz -1 ELLIPS 0.4*tankR,tankR DEL 2
ADDz tankL-0.4*tankR ELLIPS 0.4*tankR,tankR DEL 3 ENDGROUP
minX = -A/2+pipeL1+0.5*tankR maxX = A/2-pipeL1-0.5*tankR
ADD MAX(MIN(ConPosX_3, maxX-topR+ConWidth_3/2), minX+topR-ConWidth_3/2), 0, ZZYZX/2 ROTy -90 IF tankR*2 > ZZYZX-EPS THEN ZZYZX = tankR*2+EPS ARMC tankR,topR,ZZYZX/2,0,0,90 DEL 2
! Valves dR=MIN(tankR-valveR, SQR(2)*tankR/2)
RESOL 8 ADD A/2-0.4*tankR,0,ZZYZX/2
ROTy 90 ROTz 45 ARME 0.5*tankR+1.5*valveR, tankR, valveR, 0.4*tankR, dR ADD 0,dR,0.5*tankR+1.5*valveR CYLIND valveR,valveR/2 ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR DEL 2 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,dR,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 1 ROTz -45 ARME 0.5*tankR+1.5*valveR, tankR, valveR, 0.4*tankR, dR ADD 0,dR,0.5*tankR+1.5*valveR CYLIND valveR,valveR/2 ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR DEL 2 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,dR,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 2
ADD 0.5*tankR,tankR/2,-0.5*tankR-1.1*valveR CYLIND tankR+2.2*valveR,1.1*valveR DEL 1
CUTEND CUTEND DEL 1
PLACEGROUP ADDGROUP ("Connections1", "tank1") KILLGROUP "Connections1" KILLGROUP "tank1" ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple GROUP "Connections2" RESOL 6
ADD ConPosX_1,0,ConPosZ_1 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_1/2, 2, pipeL1+A/4,ConWidth_1/2, 2 DEL 1
ADD ConPosX_2,0,ConPosZ_2 MULx -1 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_2/2, 2, pipeL2+A/4,ConWidth_2/2, 2 DEL 2 ENDGROUP
RESOL res
ADD -A/2+pipeL1,0,ZZYZX/2 ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, tankR,360,4013 DEL 2
ADDx -A/2+0.4*tankR+0.15*tankL ROTy -90 PRISM 4,0.08*tankL, 0,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2, 0.8*tankR, 0, 0.8*tankR DEL 2
ADDx A/2-0.4*tankR-(0.15-0.08)*tankL ROTy -90 PRISM 4,0.08*tankL, 0,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2,-0.8*tankR, ZZYZX/2, 0.8*tankR, 0, 0.8*tankR DEL 2
CUTEND
GROUP "tank2" RESOL res ADD -A/2,0,ZZYZX/2 ROTy 90
ADDz 0.4*tankR CYLIND tankL-0.8*tankR,tankR MULz -1 ELLIPS 0.4*tankR,tankR DEL 2
ADDz tankL-0.4*tankR ELLIPS 0.4*tankR,tankR DEL 3 ENDGROUP
minX = -A/2+pipeL1+0.5*tankR maxX = A/2-pipeL1-0.5*tankR
ADD MAX(MIN(ConPosX_3, maxX-topR+ConWidth_3/2), minX+topR-ConWidth_3/2), 0, ZZYZX/2 ROTy -90 ARMC tankR,topR,ZZYZX/2,0,0,90 DEL 2
! Valves dR=SQR(2)*tankR/2
RESOL 6 ADD A/2-0.4*tankR,0,ZZYZX/2
ROTy 90 ROTz 45 ARME 0.5*tankR+2.5*valveR, tankR, valveR, 0.4*tankR, dR ADD 0,dR,0.5*tankR+1.5*valveR ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR DEL 2 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,dR,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 1 ROTz -45 ARME 0.5*tankR+2.5*valveR, tankR, valveR, 0.4*tankR, dR ADD 0,dR,0.5*tankR+1.5*valveR ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR DEL 2 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,dR,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 2
ADD 0.5*tankR,tankR/2,-0.5*tankR-1.1*valveR ROTz 90 CYLIND tankR+2.2*valveR,1.1*valveR DEL 2
CUTEND CUTEND DEL 1
PLACEGROUP ADDGROUP ("Connections2", "tank2") KILLGROUP "Connections2" KILLGROUP "tank2" ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
DEL TOP RESOL res
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 12, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 12 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Horiz Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- HORIZONTAL PRESSURE OPERATED CONDENSATE PUMP --- !
HOTSPOT2 -A/2+0.4*tankR, tankR, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2+0.4*tankR, -tankR, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2-0.4*tankR, -tankR, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2-0.4*tankR, tankR, unID: unID=unID+1
! IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN
ADD2 ConPosX_1,0 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,ConWidth_1/2, 1, pipeL1,ConWidth_1/2, 1, pipeL1,-ConWidth_1/2, 1, 0,-ConWidth_1/2, 1 DEL 1 ADD2 ConPosX_2,0 MUL2 -1,1 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,ConWidth_2/2, 1, pipeL2,ConWidth_2/2, 1, pipeL2,-ConWidth_2/2, 1, 0,-ConWidth_2/2, 1 DEL 2
ADD2 -A/2,0 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.4*tankR, tankR, 1, 0.4*tankR, -tankR, 1, tankL-0.4*tankR, -tankR, 1, tankL-0.4*tankR, tankR, 1 ADD2 0.4*tankR,0 MUL2 0.4,1 POLY2_B 3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,tankR, 1, -1,0,801, 0,-tankR,1001 DEL 2 ADD2 tankL-0.4*tankR,0 MUL2 -0.4,1 POLY2_B 3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,tankR, 1, -1,0,801, 0,-tankR,1001 DEL 3
! Top minX = -A/2+pipeL1+0.5*tankR maxX = A/2-pipeL1-0.5*tankR
ADD2 MAX(MIN(ConPosX_3, maxX-topR+ConWidth_3/2), minX+topR-ConWidth_3/2), 0 CIRCLE2 0,0,topR DEL 1
! Valve ADD2 A/2, MIN(tankR-valveR, tankR/2) POLY2_B 14, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.135*tankR, -valveR/2, 1, -0.155*tankR, valveR/2, 1, -0.15*tankR, valveR, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR/2, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, valveR/2, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, 2*valveR, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR+valveR/5, 2*valveR, 1,
0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR+valveR/5, -2*valveR, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, -2*valveR, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, -valveR/2, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR, -valveR/2, 1, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR, -valveR, 1, -0.11*tankR, -valveR, 1
LINE2 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR/2, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR, -valveR/2 LINE2 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, valveR/2, 0.1*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, -valveR/2
POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.1*tankR,0,901, 1.1*valveR,360,4001 DEL 1 ! ENDIF ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
DEL TOP ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 2, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 2 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Horiz Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
EPS = 0.0001
minD = 0.1 IF B<minD THEN B=minD
maxCW = B/2 IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
maxCW = 2*B/3 IF ConWidth_3>maxCW THEN ConWidth_3=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=maxCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_4>maxCW THEN ConWidth_4=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=maxCW ENDIF
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
pipeR1=0.8*ConWidth_1 pipeR2=0.8*ConWidth_2
pipeLowH=MIN(ConPosZ_1-pipeR1, ConPosZ_2-pipeR2)
tankR=B/2
pipeL1=tankR*0.4 pipeL2=tankR*0.4
tankL=A
topR=MIN(0.95*tankR, 1.2*(ABS(ConPosX_3-ConPosX_4)+ConWidth_4/2))
valveR=ConWidth_3/2
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Horiz Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Horiz Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 0.1+pipeL1+pipeL2 minW = 0.8*tankR + 0.1+pipeL1+pipeL2 VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,] VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,] IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF
minD = 0.1 VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,] VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,] IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF
minH = B VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
!!! IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" THEN ConPosZ_3=ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3 ConPosZ_4=ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4 !!! ENDIF
FOR i=1 TO 2 pipeLowH=MIN(ConPosZ_1-pipeR1, ConPosZ_2-pipeR2) tankR=MIN(B/2, (ZZYZX-pipeLowH-0.01)/2)
IF ConPosZ_1<ZZYZX/2-tankR+pipeR1 THEN ConPosZ_1=ZZYZX/2-tankR+pipeR1 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1 ENDIF IF ConPosZ_1>ZZYZX/2+tankR-pipeR1 THEN ConPosZ_1=ZZYZX/2+tankR-pipeR1 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1 ENDIF NEXT i VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE[ZZYZX/2-tankR+pipeR1, ZZYZX/2+tankR-pipeR1]
IF ConPosZ_2<ZZYZX/2-tankR+pipeR2 THEN ConPosZ_2=ZZYZX/2-tankR+pipeR2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2 ENDIF IF ConPosZ_2>ZZYZX/2+tankR-pipeR2 THEN ConPosZ_2=ZZYZX/2+tankR-pipeR2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE[ZZYZX/2-tankR+pipeR2, ZZYZX/2+tankR-pipeR2]
minX = -A/2+pipeL1+0.5*tankR maxX = A/2-pipeL1-0.5*tankR VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [minX, maxX] IF ConPosX_3<minX THEN ConPosX_3=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_3>maxX THEN ConPosX_3=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=maxX ENDIF
minX = -A/2+pipeL1+0.5*tankR maxX = A/2-pipeL1-0.5*tankR topPos = MAX(MIN(ConPosX_3, maxX-topR+ConWidth_3/2), minX+topR-ConWidth_3/2) minX = topPos-topR+ConWidth_4/2 maxX = topPos+topR-ConWidth_4/2
VALUES "ConPosX_4" RANGE [minX,maxX] IF ConPosX_4<minX THEN ConPosX_4=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_4>maxX THEN ConPosX_4=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=maxX ENDIF
ConPosX_1=-A/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1
ConPosX_2=A/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="ConPosZ_3" THEN ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_3 ZZYZX=ConPosZ_3 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4 PARAMETERS ZZYZX=ZZYZX ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="ConPosZ_4" THEN ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_4 ZZYZX=ConPosZ_4 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3 PARAMETERS ZZYZX=ZZYZX ENDIF ENDIF
minCW = 0.001
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Труба Впускного Соединения `
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = tankR
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<minCW THEN ConWidth_1=minCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=minCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Труба Выпускного Соединения`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = tankR
VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<minCW THEN ConWidth_2=minCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=minCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = 2*tankR/3
VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW]

ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
